sentence.Network_en: I was mistakenly assumed to be a Welshman because of my surname.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于我的姓的缘故,我被误认为是威尔士人.

sentence.Network_en: Down , down he sped , till he reached the Welshman's.
sentence.Network_cn: 一直跑到威尔斯曼家门口才停下来.

sentence.Network_en: The Welshman's sons departed at once.
sentence.Network_cn: 威尔斯曼的两个孩子立即动身出发.

PerfectNetExp.abs: welsher 欺诈者, welshman 威尔士男子, welshie 威尔士人

entry.def: A Welshman is a man who was born in Wales and considers himself to be Welsh.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or resident of Wales

auth_sentence.content: The Welshman squares for Livermore whose shot is blocked.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Welshman squares for Livermore whose shot is blocked.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Welshman squares for Livermore whose shot is blocked.

auth_sentence.content: The Welshman even scored, as if to make the point more emphatically.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Welshman even scored, as if to make the point more emphatically.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Welshman even scored, as if to make the point more emphatically.

auth_sentence.content: The Welshman beat another strong field to claim last year's Irish Open.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Welshman beat another strong field to claim last year's Irish Open.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Welshman beat another strong field to claim last year's Irish Open.
